articles.title: Jack Grealish stars in Man City’s chaotic victory over RB Leipzig - The Independent
articles.description: Manchester City 6-3 RB Leipzig: Pep Guardiola’s side started their European campaign in style despite Christopher Nkunku scoring a hat-trick
articles.content: As their £100m signing announced himself on the rarefied level of the Champions League, Manchester City demonstrated why many expect them to recover from the disappointment of losing last seasons fin… [+4922 chars]

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Barcelona's sad new reality: Bayern Munich prove Catalans can no longer compete with Europe's elite - Goal.com
articles.description: Paulo Dybala revealed that he is expecting to resume negotiations with Juventus over a new contract after leading the Italian giants to a comfortable Champions League win on Tuesday.
